author: Yousef Al-Nafjan
comment: 1. Fix the hour hand in ambient mode. It has the same issue that was fixed on regular mode.     2. Make the notification card background opaque in ambient mode. The notifications are currently overlapping with the bottom part of the watch face.       3. Add the option to disable the notification card on the watch face, but only when on ambient mode. A few other watch faces have this option, and I really like it.
title: Great watch face, but it needs the following:

author: Edward K
comment: Great watch face with a really nice subtle animation when waking it.  One major gripe though: When an hour has past, the hour hand will stick only to the current hour exactly. i.e. if it's 1:30pm, the hour hand will be at 1 sharp, instead of inbetween 1 and 2. This fixes itself when it wakes, but is very jarring and repeats.

author: Anthony Ryan
comment: Beautiful design- by far my favourite. But the hour hand doesn't update in the standby (backlight off) mode. Quite annoying to read the time, apparently latest version has fixed hour hand... But not Huawei W1

author: Mani Dasoju
comment: I really like this watchface. It's so clean, analog, and has that really smooth animation when it wakes up. The only problem is that it tends to crash quite frequently and doesn't reboot itself the next time I wake up the watch (that might just be a Android Wear thing). I have to set a different watchface and then switch back to Mango to get it back, which shouldn't be a thing because like a real watch, the face has to just stay there without becoming a distraction to the watch itself.

author: Nathan Cunningham
comment: Cool watxh watches not bad. Its free so theres not a whole lot of faces or customization but a couple more faces and some ability to add more widgets to the watch face would be nice.
title: Cool Watch Faces

author: James O'Leary
comment: Love the watch face! But for some reason it has been crashing a few times a day. I have the Asus Zenwatch 2

author: Jaxon Lee
comment: Doesn't "do" anything special, but the face itself is delightful. Light and dark themes.
title: Gorgeous watch face

author: Scott Pace
comment: Has a habit of becoming unresponsive requiring my Urbane 2 to be restarted.  Other than that, it's a beautiful watch face.
title: Very nice but...

author: Andrew LeDawson
comment: Mango doesn't have a particularly nice design, extra options, or good readability.  At least it's free.
title: Not very interesting

author: Jonathan Laycock
comment: Tried it and my battery was at 15% two hours later. Might have been a fluke but I won't try it again.
title: Killed my battery

author: Peter Nguyen
comment: Not only is the hour hand fixed, but now it performs more smoothly on the older hardware of my Moto 360 1st gen.
title: Great Watch Face

author: fendiofnight
comment: Dumb retard watch face. Doesn't even appear on Android wear after installation. Stupid

author: Sudil Mahendra
comment: Drains battery...there should be some options to cut down battery usage

author: Jungjae Kim
comment: I like it.. thanks
title: Thanks for fixing hiur hand problem

author: Keith Blackshear
comment: I like the look of it but can't get into settings to try out the light face option.
title: OK

author: Devanno Lopez
comment: Downloaded it but didn't appear anywhere. Restarted my phone and watch nothing, tried it on my other phone and the same problem occurred.

author: Tech United
comment: It's great but needs performance improvements when switching from display off to display on.

author: Ulrich Schonhardt
comment: Don't like the animation.
title: No configuration.

author: Farshad Lashgari
comment: Just 2 faces

author: Toni Tpni
comment: Love it. So unique

author: Chris Weipert
comment: Clean and crisp look

author: Alex Tealdi
comment: Very nice

author: Khalid Nazir
comment: Simply stunning

author: Jaydeep Jain
comment: Nice

author: SaNDeeP A V
comment: Design wise this watch looks great on my moto360 2. But I have three issues with this watchface. 1. It's shows the wrong time. It's lagging an hour behind the actual time. 2. Notifications get overlapped with date /time, while in ambient mode, which makes everything difficult to read. I think watchface needs to dismiss the notification when in ambient mode. 3. Battery drains quickly, when compared to other watchmaker.
title: Wrong time and other issues

author: Joshua Miller
comment: The face is broken and the hour hand only points directly at the current hour. This means at say 7:59 AM, the time is very ambiguous; the hour hand will point at the 7, rather then next to the 8.
title: Looks good, doesn't work

author: Michael Wolf
comment: Rather pointless having a pretty watch face that doesn't show the correct time at a glance. The hour hand points at the actual hour for the whole hour meaning it looks like it's always an hour slow, negating the whole purpose of being a timepiece.
title: A watch face needs to show the time!

author: Paul Stafford
comment: No idea why but when I set this watch face,  the time is right... Look an hour later and it's always wrong and behind an hour? Huh??
title: Wrong time

author: Qui Phạm Văn
comment: It looks very nice, but sometimes it indicates 1 hour later than actual hour.
title: Wrong hour

author: Brian Russell
comment: Not sure you can call a face "minimal" if it has both a central seconds hand and running seconds on a subdial.
title: Minimal but redundant?

author: Dharmesh Mokani
comment: Watch face looks good but hour hand is not moving properly. For example : Assume time is 9:45, Long hand is still on 9 instead of in between 9 and 10.

author: Owen Renn
comment: Incorrect hour hand? Isn't this supposed to be a showcase app for Android Wear?

author: Alan Duking Zeng
comment: This is beautiful, but it goes back to ambient mode from the normal screen way too quick.

author: Gajanan Mavinkurve
comment: Good face! I love MANGO for sure!!!!!

author: Lynn Young
comment: I like the face. It's good on battery and has the info needed without clutter. Ambient mode is wrong as far as the hour hand. If fixed, I'd give 5 stars
title: Hour hand in ambient is wrong

author: Nicholas Tehrani
comment: It looks great and the animation is one of the coolest I've seen, but it crashes after a few hours. I have a Moto 360 and an lg g3.
title: Looks really good.
